attributes.action: Introduce Politics as a mandatory subject for all Secondary School students.
attributes.additional_details: Help students develop an understanding for politics due to the new voting age of 16. Aims to reduce political bias and makes sure that voters vote using their own understanding of the UKs democracy and politics. With the new voting age coming into effect voters at the age of 16 could lack an understanding of our political system and could be bias or swayed into the wrong direction.
attributes.background: To help students and young voters develop an understanding for the UKs political system.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make Government & Politics a compulsory, core subject in schools
